description:
Sixth year ha class. Age 15, Aries, blood type O. President of the Health Committee.
Hagumi that has a personality akin to a gentle big brother to his juniors, though is cursed with bad luck to himself, and anyone that gets tagged along with him. Also dubbed by others and his own members - `bad luck chairman` - and his own committee as `bad luck committee`.
Source: Wiki
name: Zenpouji Isaku
